content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, the square root of, 4 times x squared, plus 27, end root, and denominator, the square root of, x squared, plus 27 x, plus 3, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> is
